#io19extended

=====================
EN:

If you donâ€™t know yet, Google I/O 2019 was held on May 7-9 at Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View, CAâ€¦

...and GDG Radzymin is going to celebrate it organizing the Google I/O Extended Radzymin ğŸ’¥
But we will do it in an uncommon way, we will do it by night ğŸŒƒ

The plan is very straightforward: we are going to close a venue door at 18-19 and have fun with technology till the sunrise.

Some activities that we are going to provide:
- watching the best speeches from Google I/O 2019
- playing retro Pegasus, Amiga and Commodore 64 games
- workshops:
- developing apps on Commodore 64 in the Basic programming language ğŸ™Š
- web apps with Angular + Firebase
- mobile apps with NativeScript
- Angular + NestJS
- ask me everything aboutâ€¦ sessions
- watching and listening motivational and self-improvement talks
- conversations about technology, life, success, and happiness till the dusk
- and who knows what else ğŸ˜±

We know that during regular GDG Radzymin events we usually do not have too much time for Q&A, but this time we have the whole night to serve you. Come with your problems and we will be happy to help you ğŸ¤“

As usual, we provide food, drinks (a lot of â˜•) and prizes for the most active and assiduous attendees.

Come over even for an hour, till midnight or for the whole night.
